ygData.subject: Re: Help me!
ygData.msgSnippet: If you go to www.castersrealm.com they have some very good suggestions as to race/class. Follow the link to the class, and then select the class creation guide
ygData.messageBody:
If you go to www.castersrealm.com they have some
very good suggestions as to race/class. Follow the
link to the class, and then select the class creation
guide link. In this guide they also give you
suggestions on how to apply your bonus points to your base
stats.<br><br>A friend of mine created an DE SK and didn't apply
anything to STR. At lvl 19, he ended up deleting and
restarting this character... If he had visited
'www.castersrealm.com' first, he would have gotten it right the first
time.
